
{{alias}}
    Number of hours in a day.

    The value is a generalization and does **not** take into account
    inaccuracies due to daylight savings conventions, crossing timezones, or
    other complications with time and dates.

    Examples
    --------
    > var days = 3.14;
    > var hrs = days * {{alias}}
    75.36

    See Also
    --------
